name: My First Metroid
description:
My First Metroid was made for the Metroidvania Month 19 GameJam hosted by FalconNova.

Made in 1 month in Unity 2021.3.0f1 and also using my very own basic 2D character controller.

Any feedback or comments are welcome

2D Controller:

https://3rdculture.itch.io/2d-basic-character-controller-platformer
